title: #4 LVC gets win over West Virginia
text:
#4 LVC gets win over West Virginia 
Updated: 
Posted by: Shannel Douglas 

HERSHEY -- #4 Lebanon Valley College gets the win over West Virginia Saturday, 3-0 at Hersheypark Arena Related Stories
